Package hexanome.fourteen.server.control

Class GameHandlerController

java.lang.Object
hexanome.fourteen.server.control.GameHandlerController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/games/") public class GameHandlerController extends Object
Controller to handle lobby service callbacks.

      Parameters:
      gameid - The game id for the created game

    • deleteGame

      @DeleteMapping("{gameid}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteGame(@PathVariable String gameid)
      Remove a game with a matching game ID. Only admins can delete a game.
      Parameters:
      gameid - game ID to remove
      Returns:
      The full response

    • retrieveGame

      @GetMapping(value="{gameid}", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>> retrieveGame(@PathVariable String gameid, @RequestParam("access_token") String accessToken, @RequestParam(required=false) String hash)
      Get a game board.
      Parameters:
      gameid - The game id corresponding to the game.
      accessToken - The access token belonging to the player getting the game.
      hash - The hash of the last response (optional).
      Returns:
      The full response
